General.Name: Suzhou Etron Technologies Co Ltd
General.Description: Suzhou Etron Technologies Co.,Ltd. provides electronics manufacturing services worldwide. The company offers industrial products, such as power supplies, motor drives, smart meters, and other measuring instruments for service systems, wind power generation, and intelligent instrument industries; telecommunication products comprising wireless filter and DDCS for use in antenna buildings, data centers, and enterprise networks; and health care products consisting of assembled PCBA of medical devices that are used for the analysis, diagnosis, and treatment applications. It also provides automotive products; and consumer products in cleaning machines, electronical tools, sanitary ware, and others. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

1.Name: Ms. Yan  Jiang
1.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board, CFO & Director
